attributes.action: Fines from speed cameras should be used to maintain roads
attributes.additional_details: Britains most profitable cameras make more than £1,600 a day
attributes.background: A common issue on the roads in the U.K. Are the damage of roads such as potholes, cracks, uneven surfaces and loose stones. My vehicle and others get damaged due to the lack of road maintenance. Lack of road maintenance can be dangerous to road users and pedestrians.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for all roads in the UK. The UK Government, through Highways England, is responsible for major roads in England. 

Local roads are the responsibility of local councils. Major roads in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland are the responsibility of devolved governments.
